name: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
description: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran is a movie starring John Abraham, Boman Irani, and Diana Penty. A look at India's second confidential nuclear test series at Pokhran led by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, during the time of PM Atal Bihari...
keywords: army,indian army,based on real events,nuclear test,nuclear reactor
